careerPath.title: Code Foundation
careerPath.descr: Interested in learning how to code, but unsure where to start? This is the path for you!

careerPath.title: Computer Science
careerPath.descr: Looking for an introduction to the theory behind programming? Master Python while learning data structures, algorithms, and more!

careerPath.title: Data Science
careerPath.descr: Learn SQL and Python and build the skills you need to query, analyze, and visualize data.

careerPath.title: Web Development
careerPath.descr: Master the languages of the web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL. This path is great for budding front-end or back-end engineers!
